pokemon.name: Dugtrio
pokemon.flavorText: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

pokemon.name: Meowth
pokemon.flavorText: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

pokemon.name: Persian
pokemon.flavorText: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

pokemon.name: Psyduck
pokemon.flavorText: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.

pokemon.name: Golduck
pokemon.flavorText: Often seen swim­ ming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

pokemon.name: Mankey
pokemon.flavorText: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

pokemon.name: Primeape
pokemon.flavorText: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

pokemon.name: Growlithe
pokemon.flavorText: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

pokemon.name: Arcanine
pokemon.flavorText: A POKéMON that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

pokemon.name: Poliwag
pokemon.flavorText: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

pokemon.name: Poliwhirl
pokemon.flavorText: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

pokemon.name: Poliwrath
pokemon.flavorText: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

pokemon.name: Abra
pokemon.flavorText: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.

pokemon.name: Kadabra
pokemon.flavorText: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

pokemon.name: Alakazam
pokemon.flavorText: Its brain can out­ perform a super­ computer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

pokemon.name: Machop
pokemon.flavorText: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

pokemon.name: Machoke
pokemon.flavorText: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

pokemon.name: Machamp
pokemon.flavorText: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

pokemon.name: Bellsprout
pokemon.flavorText: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.

pokemon.name: Weepinbell
pokemon.flavorText: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.

pokemon.name: Victreebel
pokemon.flavorText: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

pokemon.name: Tentacool
pokemon.flavorText: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

pokemon.name: Tentacruel
pokemon.flavorText: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

pokemon.name: Geodude
pokemon.flavorText: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

pokemon.name: Graveler
pokemon.flavorText: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.
